title: Training Camp Fly on the Wall
itunes:title: Training Camp Fly on the Wall
description:
A room filled with heroes- Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all the latest news around the NFL including the majorly anticipated HOF game recap (9:30), the Jets new signing (17:00) and Melvin Gordon requesting a trade from the Chargers. (24:10) Gil Brandt was inducted into the HOF and the heroes share some stories of the past. (34:57). What would it like to be a fly on the wall in some of these training camps? (41:52).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
